==Trivia==
* Some team compositions as well as weapons fro some 4 stars got changed on this run.
** Kuki Shinobu is no longer using the Favonius Sword. instead, she is carring Iron Sting, this changed her Energy Recharge from 190,8% to 135,0%.
** Bennett is no longer using the Favonius Sword, instead, he is carring the Sapwood Blade, this changed his Energy Recharge from 262.6% to 234.7%.
** Bennett is no longer alone with Xiangling, now Xingqiu and Lisa are part of his team.
